name: reg_transform
author: NiftyReg Developers
description: Tool for performing various transformation operations on medical images including control point to deformation conversion, composition of transformations, and converting between deformation and displacement fields.

inputs.name: Reference Image
inputs.description: Filename of the reference image

inputs.name: CPP to DEF Input
inputs.description: Conversion from control point position to deformation field. Filename of input lattice of control point positions (CPP).

inputs.name: CPP to DEF Output
inputs.description: Filename of the output deformation field image (DEF).

inputs.name: Second CPP for Composition 1
inputs.description: Composition of two lattices of control points. CPP2(CPP1(x)). Filename of lattice of control point that contains the second deformation (CPP2).

inputs.name: First CPP for Composition 1
inputs.description: Filename of lattice of control point that contains the initial deformation (CPP1).

inputs.name: Output for Composition 1
inputs.description: Filename of the output deformation field.

inputs.name: CPP for Composition 2
inputs.description: Composition of a deformation field with a lattice of control points. CPP(DEF(x)). Filename of lattice of control point that contains the second deformation (CPP).

inputs.name: DEF for Composition 2
inputs.description: Filename of the deformation field to be used as initial deformation (DEF).

inputs.name: Output for Composition 2
inputs.description: Filename of the output deformation field.

inputs.name: Second DEF for Composition 3
inputs.description: Composition of two deformation fields. DEF2(DEF1(x)). Filename of the second deformation field (DEF2).

inputs.name: First DEF for Composition 3
inputs.description: Filename of the first deformation field (DEF1).

inputs.name: Output for Composition 3
inputs.description: Filename of the output deformation field.

inputs.name: DEF to DISP Input
inputs.description: Convert a deformation field into a displacement field. Filename of deformation field x'=T(x).

inputs.name: DEF to DISP Output
inputs.description: Filename of displacement field x'=x+T(x).

inputs.name: DISP to DEF Input
inputs.description: Convert a displacement field into a deformation field. Filename of displacement field x'=x+T(x).

inputs.name: DISP to DEF Output
inputs.description: Filename of deformation field x'=T(x).

inputs.name: Update Sform Image
inputs.description: Update the sform of a floating (source) image using an affine transformation. Filename of image to be updated.

inputs.name: Update Sform Affine
inputs.description: Affine transformation defined as Affine x Reference = Floating. Filename of affine transformation.

inputs.name: Update Sform Output
inputs.description: Updated image filename.

inputs.name: Affine for Aff2Def
inputs.description: Compose a non-rigid with an affine. Filename of affine transformation.

inputs.name: Target for Aff2Def
inputs.description: Image used as a target for the non-rigid step.

inputs.name: CPP or DEF for Aff2Def
inputs.description: Reference image (B). Filename of control point position or deformation field.

inputs.name: Output for Aff2Def
inputs.description: Output deformation field filename.

inputs.name: Input Affine for Inversion
inputs.description: Invert an affine transformation matrix. Filename of input affine matrix.

inputs.name: Output Affine for Inversion
inputs.description: Filename of inverted affine matrix.

inputs.name: First Affine for Composition
inputs.description: Compose two affine transformation matrices. Filename of first affine matrix.

inputs.name: Second Affine for Composition
inputs.description: Filename of second affine matrix.

inputs.name: Output Affine for Composition
inputs.description: Filename of composed affine matrix result.

output-files.name: CPP to DEF Output File
output-files.description: File containing the CPP to DEF converted deformation field.

output-files.name: Composition 1 Output File
output-files.description: File containing the composed deformation field from two control point lattices.

output-files.name: Composition 2 Output File
output-files.description: File containing the composed deformation field from a deformation field and a control point lattice.

output-files.name: Composition 3 Output File
output-files.description: File containing the composed deformation field from two deformation fields.

output-files.name: DEF to DISP Output File
output-files.description: File containing the converted displacement field from a deformation field.

output-files.name: DISP to DEF Output File
output-files.description: File containing the converted deformation field from a displacement field.

output-files.name: Update Sform Output File
output-files.description: File containing the updated image with modified sform.

output-files.name: AFF to DEF Output File
output-files.description: File containing the composed deformation field from a non-rigid and an affine transformation.

output-files.name: Inverted Affine Output File
output-files.description: File containing the inverted affine matrix.

output-files.name: Composed Affine Output File
output-files.description: File containing the composed affine matrix.
